This query expression finds15 matches on "laundry service".Proximity search finds terms that are near each other in a document. Insert a tilde "~"symbol at the end of a phrase followed by the number of words that create theproximity boundary.This query searches for the terms "hotel" and "airport" within 5 words of each other in adocument.
